org.jcvi.jillion.fasta

Class FastaFileParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.FastaFileParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FastaParser

    public abstract class FastaFileParser
extends Object
implements FastaParser
    FastaFileParser will parse a single fasta encoded file and call the appropriate visitXXX methods on the given FastaVisitor. As of Jillion 4.2, FastaFileParser supports non-redundant text fasta files like the ones described in ftp://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov/blast/db/README. If non-redundant records are encountered, then the visitXXX methods will be called in a way such that it will appear as if they were redundantly listed. The non-redundant defline will be split and each identical sequence will be visited separately with each of the many ids for it. Creating FastaVisitorCallback.FastaVisitorMementos (if supported by the FastaParser implementation) are also non-redundant aware and will correctly only visit the subset of non-redundant records according to when the memento was created.
    Author:
    dkatzel

      • create

        public static FastaParser create(File fastaFile)
                          throws IOException
        Create a new FastaFileParser instance that will parse the given fasta encoded file.
        Parameters:
        fastaFile - the file to parse.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the file is null.
        IOException - if the file is not readable or does not exist.

      • create

                          throws IOException
        Create a new FastaFileParser instance that will parse the fasta encoded data from the given InputStreamSupplier.
        Parameters:
        inputStreamSupplier - the InputStreamSupplier to use to get the inputStreams of fasta encoded data.
        Throws:

        IOException
        Since:
        5.0

      • create

        public static FastaParser create(InputStream inputStream)
        Create a new FastaFileParser instance that will parse the given fasta encoded inputStream. Please Note that inputStream implementations of the FastaFileParser can not create FastaVisitorCallback.FastaVisitorMementos or use #parse(FastaVisitor, FastaVisitorMemento) method.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the InputStream to parse.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if inputStream is null.

      • parse

        public void parse(FastaVisitor visitor)
           throws IOException
        Parse the fasta file starting from the beginning of the file (or InputStream) and call the appropriate visit methods on the given FastaVisitor.
        Specified by:
        parse in interface FastaParser
        Parameters:
        visitor - the FastaVisitor instance to call visit methods on; can not be null;
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem parsing the fasta file.
        NullPointerException - if visitor is null.
        See Also:
        FastaParser.canParse()
